requirements_text:
I have identified some key information from the resumes in the file "file-h4yCe1uQtW6O6rwS7RbKf2G8" which contains ideal candidates for the Staff Backend Software Engineer position:

1. Experience in "staff software engineer" and "engineer manager" roles at Bytedance - Tiktok, including responsibilities such as leading a team and taking charge of fundamental delivery products, premium products, and brand safety initiatives【19†source】【15†source】.
2. Exceptional skills in service-oriented architecture (SOA), Java, and distributed systems【15†source】.
3. Proficiency in languages such as Java, Python, and shell scripting, as well as experience with AWS, relational databases, and NoSQL databases like Dynamo and Redis 【19†source】.

Now, I will proceed to analyze the other file "file-TjafTeJuAPUPd1TBe5O2Hgy2" to separate the resumes into unqualified and over-qualified categories.
